imputation.translation[0].definitions[0]: a suggestion that someone or something is the cause of a particular situation, or is responsible for a particular action, especially something bad
A corporation may sue for an imputation on its trading reputation.
The company wished to avoid the imputation of blame for the accident.
imputation.translation[0].definitions[1]: a method of calculating the value of something when you do not know what the actual value is
The Population Census used a procedure of imputation to infer values for those households which failed to return their forms.
